newsitem.title: UK: Zimbabwe tenders to buy 28,000 t raw sugar -trade. [CORRECTED 01:30 GMT 20/11]
newsitem.headline: Zimbabwe tenders to buy 28,000 t raw sugar -trade. [CORRECTED 01:30 GMT 20/11]

text.p: Zimbabwe tendered to buy 28,000 tonnes of raw sugar for arrival in two shipments in January and February (corrects from "January and September"), traders said on Tuesday.

The tender had a deadline of 1700 hours local time on November 22, they said. Various shipments options were possible but the initial requireement was for two 14,000-tonne cargoes to arrive for January 6/11 and February (corrects from September) 3/8 1997.
Results would be made known after 1545 hours local time on November 25, traders said.
